name: Form Alike
description:
A small platformer where you have to reach the victory flag by jumping one matching shapes before time runs out.

This is the first ever game I finished. I did this as a 7 day challenge. I will always like to hear your critics and feedback, which will help in my next projects.

Musics by: http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music

https://www.playonloop.com/

Sound Effects by:

https://www.zapsplat.com/

https://www.noiseforfun.com/

https://www.soundjay.com/
